text: Lévon Sayan or Levon Sanosyan (, born December 17, 1934) is a French-Armenian impresario and producer, as well as an operatic tenor. He was born in Aix-en- Provence, France. He was the music manager of Charles Aznavour, Liza Minnelli, Plácido Domingo and Mario del Monaco. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:French singers Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Aix-en-Provence
title: Lévon Sayan
